description: Treat the tastebuds to decadent truffles made with crushed Oreo cookies, Philadelphia cream cheese, Cadbury white chocolate and cinnamon.
name: Oreo Cinnamon-bun Truffles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 270g Oreo Double Stuff Cinnamon Bun Cookies
250g Philadelphia Cream Cheese Original Block, softened slightly
180g Cadbury Baking White Chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Process cookies in a food processor until finely crushed. Reserve 2 tbs.
Combine cream cheese and crushed cookies in a bowl. Roll 1 tbs of mixture into a ball then place on prepared tray. Repeat for remaining mixture. Chill for 1 hour or until firm.

Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring occasionally, or until melted and smooth. Using 2 forks to hold the balls, dip balls in melted chocolate to coat. Allow any excess to drain off. Place on the lined tray.
Mix sugar, cinnamon and reserved crushed cookies in a bowl. Sprinkle truffles with cookie mixture. Chill for 30 minutes or until set.
